verbs.description: Roughly 800 troops [V: are] stationed at the US - Mexico borders as part of Trump 's efforts to combat a " drastic surge of illegal activity . " The National Guard is stationed there to help Border Patrol look for suspicious activity , but they are prohibited from looking across the border through binoculars .

" The National Guard is stationed there to help Border Patrol look for suspicious activity , but they are prohibited from looking across the border through binoculars .
